sourcesContent:
<template>
    <editor
    :value="editorText"
    :options="editorOptions"
    :html="editorHtml"
    :visible="editorVisible"
    previewStyle="vertical"
    height="500px"
    mode="wysiwyg"
    />
</template>

<script>
import 'tui-editor/dist/tui-editor.css';
import 'tui-editor/dist/tui-editor-contents.css';
import 'codemirror/lib/codemirror.css';
import { Editor } from '@toast-ui/vue-editor';


export default {
  name: 'TextEditor',
  data() {
    return {
      editorText: '',
      editorOptions: {
        minHeight: '200px',
        language: 'en_US',
        useCommandShortcut: true,
        useDefaultHTMLSanitizer: true,
        usageStatistics: true,
        hideModeSwitch: false,
        toolbarItems: [
          'heading',
          'bold',
          'italic',
          'strike',
          'divider',
          'hr',
          'quote',
          'divider',
          'ul',
          'ol',
          'task',
          'indent',
          'outdent',
          'divider',
          'table',
          'image',
          'link',
          'divider',
          'code',
          'codeblock',
        ],
      },
      editorHtml: '',
      editorVisible: true,
    };
  },
  components: {
    editor: Editor,
  },
};
</script>
